A digital edition of Lazarillo de Tormes created by students at Columbia University.

mini lazarillo
A minimal edition of Lazarillo de Tormes

Bibliography

Recogemos aquí una breve bibliografía utilizada a lo largo del curso. No aspira, pues, de ninguna manera a tener un carácter exhaustivo.

Completar la bibliografía

  1. Goyal, Yogita. Romance, Diaspora, And Black Atlantic Literature. Cambridge University Press, 2010. Print.
  2. Lau, Jesús, Anna Maria Tammaro, and Theo J. D. Bothma. Libraries Driving Access To Knowledge. De Gruyter Saur, 2012. Web.
  3. Césaire, Aimé. Discourse On Colonialism. Monthly Review Press, 2001. Print.
  4. McGann, J. Radiant Textuality: Literary Studies After the World Wide Web. 1st edition. Palgrave Macmillan, 2001. Print.
  5. Nakamura, Lisa, and Peter Chow-White. Race After the Internet. Routledge, 2012. Print.
